Hips
Wednesday, August 16th, 2017, 12:45:23 AM

Hey Plat folks, we get to beta test again! Free slips Thursday evening if you help out.

Hey everyone, sometime Thursday evening, we're going to open the arena up for some beta runs. We'll be giving out some slips to those that do some beta testing. We mostly want you to to team up during this, but doing some solo matches will be cool too. If you help beta test, you'll get to keep everything you earn plus get some slips when the event opens Friday evening! We will have a pile out, but we're going to be monitoring it this time so that no one is loading up alts with tons of free slips. See you soon!

Wyrom, PM

Hips
Wednesday, August 16th, 2017, 2:09:50 PM

More deets from the bossman:

Don't have an exact time for testing/sneak peak. Thursday later in the evening is all I can really say.

It will be the same pile for slips like last time, so characters will be limited to X number. You CAN use alts, just don't creating new characters and just grabbing slips. Grab what you'll test with. I'll be giving you guys more come Friday after you've helped.

Testing 3v3 matches is important. But if you can test 2v2 and 1v1 that would be helpful too. You can use this time to also see the flow of the arena if you've never done it before. Basically, all testing is important as long as you do it during the test phase.

Wyrom, PM

Heads up to Plat people, now that the beta testing is over there are 100-count booklets available throughout the weekend. One per account. At the entrance to the arena.

Announcement: The beta reward is now available at the Duskruin Arena, Entrance. It will only be available throughout the weekend. These are limited to one per account. Be sure to grab it. Thank you again for your help in making Duskruin great!

Thank you for participating in Duskruin Arena 2017 Beta Testing! We hope you enjoyed it! This item (a platinum dueling slip booklet on a wooden stand) will be ACCOUNT ATTUNED. It also has the following properties: This booklet is good for 100 entries into Duskruin Arena. If you wish to select this item, please GET the dueling slip booklet again within 15 seconds.
